subSections.title: Kanji
Readings
subSections.text:
{{ja-readings
|goon=きょう<きやう<くゐやう
|kanon=けい<けい<くゑい
|toon=ひん
|kun=あに-, に.い-, に.い-さん, え-<え-<𛀁-, せ-
|nanori=えだ<えだ<𛀁だ, これ, さき, しげ, ただ, ね, よし
}}

Etymology 1

{{ja-pron|けい|y=ko|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}
* Pitch accent for suffix unknown.

subSections.title: Noun
Idioms
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|兄たり難く弟たり難し|けい たりがたく てい たりがたし}}

subSections.title: Pronoun
subSections.text:
{{ja-pos|pronoun|けい}}

# ''pronoun referencing an [[older]] [[brother]] [[figure]]'': [[you]], [[he]]

subSections.title: Suffix
subSections.text:
{{ja-pos|suffix|けい}}

# ''attaches to a name referencing an [[older]] [[brother]] [[figure]]'': [[Mister]], [[Mr.]]
